data.message:
Why are so many of you confused? Shady XV is not an Eminem album, it's a compilation album celebrating 15 years of Shady Records. Disc one (X) showcases the new artists that have most recently signed. Disc 2 (V) showcases older artists and music.

Although, I would rather have all new tracks from them all, seeing as I own the older versions.
